overview: Sebastien has been working in the IT industry for 4 years - as a Business Developer and as a Venture Capital investor. Prior to joining Yoolink he worked as Business Developer for Orange. Part of the Orange’s strategic marketing team, he was developing key innovative products and services for the Telco industry. Prior to that he worked for XAnge Private Equity - a Paris based leading Early Stage Venture capital investor - as an analyst where he took part in several world class investments. Sebastien started his career by founding Koalis software, a Berlin based CMS solution editor developing solutions for SME. Sebastien has studied and worked in France, Germany and the US and holds a Master’s degree in Management from EM Lyon.
